responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "900593594960D85F01DC8188FBA5C0AF", "The Anchor of Vuul is one of many configurations that can be formed by the Lightpact Configuration. Its purpose is to bind the lifeforce of entities from the the quasi-plane of Vuul to the current realm. This act also forces the entity to take its true form, extracting it from any body it might be hiding within. ")
name: MADD_0002_ArcanaEncyclopedius_10
